message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good deal for both of us!
You can have 2k, I'll take the rest. It's a fair deal, don't be greedy!
Let's compromise.  I'll take 60% and you can have 40%.  This is a better deal than last round for both of us.
We're getting desperate, let's split it 50/50. It's a fair split, no need to fight for more.
